title: League wont download
body: So i downloaded league and this wizards works, then the launcher works, but when i launch it a error pops up 4 times in a row and says i need to reinstall it. I reinstalled it but it did the same thing. Then i reset my pc and the same thing happened. Can anyone help me? This is what the error says C:\Riot Games\ League of Legends\ zilb.dll is either not designed to run on windows or it contains an error. Try reinstalling the program again using the original installation media or contact your system administrator of the software vendor for support. Error status 0xc000012f. A Couple more pop up and say the same thing expect the zilb.dll is changed to MSVCP140.dll. Also i know league works on my pc cause ive been using it to play league for 2 years.

replies.body:
The step provided by the other player can work as a temporary workaround, but it won't actually fix the issue.  The permissions sent won't be permanent, and eventually all those old legacy files are going to be removed once we've all settled on the updated client.  When that happens, those same players are likely going to run into the same issue again.  

The [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide requires some more legwork but also makes for a more permanent fix.

There could be a couple things happening here, and I'd like to help!  To start, I suggest making sure your Windows is up to date to make sure it has all the necessary products it needs to download League.  Make sure that you're also downloading the correct client from the [official download source](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload).  

Finally, go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that your OS (post update) settings are allowing League game files to be accessed and scanned.  

I hope that helps, but let me know if you have any questions.
